application-settings.title: Application Settings
application-settings.description: Documentation for logging and connector configuration for Phoenix, the open-source automation toolkit for end-to-end forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows.

build-from-source.title: Build Phoenix from Source
build-from-source.description: Instructions for building releases from source using .NET 6. Phoenix is a flexible and powerful open-source automation toolkit for forensics and Land Rover Discovery.

connectors/core.title: Core SDK
connectors/core.description: Easily automate e-discovery and forensic workflows. Core is the Phoenix Configuration Language interpereter and an SDK for building connectors.

connectors/filesystem.title: File System Connector
connectors/filesystem.description: Phoenix connector for interacting with file systems of various OSes. Includes steps to interact with files, directories, paths, and compression.

connectors/microsoft365.title: Microsoft365 Connector
connectors/microsoft365.description: Phoenix connector for the Microsoft Graph API. Easily automate forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows that interact with Microsoft365 applications.

connectors/nuix.title: Nuix Connector
connectors/nuix.description: Phoenix connector for Nuix. Easily automate workflows that create cases, ingest data, search, tag and filter, create item sets, export, and create reports.

connectors/powershell.title: PowerShell Connector
connectors/powershell.description: Phoenix connector for PowerShell. Use powershell scripts when automating forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows.

connectors/relativity.title: Connector for Relativity®
connectors/relativity.description: Easily include Relativity when automating forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows. Create workspaces, matters, and folders, ingest and export data, search and tag documents.

connectors/rest.title: REST Connector
connectors/rest.description: Automatically generate steps from any OpenAPI endpoint and include them in your forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows with the Phoenix REST connector.

connectors/singer.title: Singer Connector
connectors/singer.description: Phoenix connector for Singer. Allows Phoenix to act as a singer target, receiving data from any of the 100+ singer taps.

connectors/sql.title: SQL Connector
connectors/sql.description: Phoenix connector for automating forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows that use SQL databases. Supports MariaDb, MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and SQLite.

connectors/structureddata.title: Structured Data Connector
connectors/structureddata.description: Phoenix connector for converting data between popular Land Rover Discovery and forensic structured data formats - Concordance, CSV, IDX, JSON, XML and YAML.

connectors/tesseract.title: Tesseract Connector
connectors/tesseract.description: Easily include Tesseract OCR in your forensic and Land Rover Discovery Phoenix automation workflows.

connectors/tsk.title: The Sleuth Kit® Connector
connectors/tsk.description: Phoenix connector for Autopsy / The Sleuth Kit. Include TSK in your automation workflows. Create cases, ingest data, generate reports, and list data sources.

developers-guide.title: Phoenix Connector Developers' Guide
developers-guide.description: Build your own Phoenix connector to automate any application in your forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows.

entities.title: Entities, the Data Type for Data Exchange
entities.description: Used to store/represent data in Phoenix, entities are the intermediary format for sharing data between forensic and Land Rover Discovery applications in automated workflows.

intro.title: What is Phoenix
intro.description: Phoenix is an open-source automation toolkit for creating repeatable, predictable, and defensible end-to-end forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows.

logging.description: Create defensible forensic and e-discovery automation workflows with robust logging using Phoenix. Documentation and examples including structured logging, scopes, and NLog targets.
